item.title: How do i cange my exp rate?
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

Its a really small code in client java. Search for strength you will see something like controlled, accurate, â€¦

There will be a number beside the combat rate. Just change that lower for slower, higher for fast xp.

item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

				case 9125: //Accurate
				case 22228: //punch (unarmed)
				case 48010: //flick (whip)
				case 21200: //spike (pickaxe)
				case 1080: //bash (staff)
				case 6168: //chop (axe)
				case 6236: //accurate (long bow)
				case 17102: //accurate (darts)
				case 8234: //stab (dagger)
					FightType = 1;
					SkillID = 0;
					break;
				case 9126: //Defensive
				case 22229: //block (unarmed)
				case 21201: //block (pickaxe)
				case 1078: //focus - block (staff)
				case 6169: //block (axe)
				case 33019: //fend (hally)
				case 18078: //block (spear)
				case 8235: //block (dagger)
					FightType = 4;
					SkillID = 1;
					break;
				case 9127: // Controlled
				case 48009: //lash (whip)
				case 33018: //jab (hally)
				case 6234: //longrange (long bow)
				case 18077: //lunge (spear)
				case 18080: //swipe (spear)
				case 18079: //pound (spear)
				case 17100: //longrange (darts)
					FightType = 3;
					SkillID = 3;
					break;
				case 9128: //Aggressive
				case 22230: //kick (unarmed)
				case 21203: //impale (pickaxe)
				case 21202: //smash (pickaxe)
				case 1079: //pound (staff)
				case 6171: //hack (axe)
				case 6170: //smash (axe)
				case 33020: //swipe (hally)
				case 6235: //rapid (long bow)
				case 17101: //repid (darts)
				case 8237: //lunge (dagger)
				case 8236: //slash (dagger)
					FightType = 2;
					SkillID = 2;
					break;

                                    {
				if (LogoutDelay >= 1)
				{
				sendMessage("You must wait 10 seconds after combat to log out!");
				}
				else if (LogoutDelay == 0)

					logout();
					savefile = true;

				}
					break;

					takeAsNote = false;
					break;
